attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Psychic Float
abilities.text: If you have any Psychic Energy attached to your Active Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for that Pokémon is 0.

attacks.name: Double Leg Hammer
attacks.text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Gravitation
abilities.text: Each Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) gets -20 HP. No more than 20 HP can be reduced by all Gravitation Poké-Bodies.

attacks.name: Geo Impact
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that is the same type as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

data.name: Metagross δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Lightning Metal type.

abilities.name: Delta Control
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 4 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the 3 other cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Crush and Burn
attacks.text: You may discard as many Energy cards as you like attached to your Pokémon in play. If you do, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card you discarded.

abilities.name: Super Connectivity
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Psychic or Metal Energy card and attach it to your Active Pokémon. Then, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Link Blast
attacks.text: If Metagross and the Defending Pokémon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

data.name: Metagross
rules: This Pokémon is both Psychic Metal type.

abilities.name: Metal Juncture
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Metal Energy card attached to 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Squared Attack
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Magnetic Reversal
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extra Comet Punch
attacks.text: During your next turn, Metagross's Extra Comet Punch attack's base damage is 100.

data.flavorText: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

data.name: Metagross

attacks.name: Quad Smash
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

data.flavorText: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.

data.name: Metagross-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Magnetic Laser
attacks.text: You may move a Metal Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Squared Attack
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

data.name: M Metagross-EX
rules: Mega Evolution rule: When 1 of your Pokémon becomes a Mega Evolution Pokémon, your turn ends.
Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Gatling Slug
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Magnetic Warp
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Iron Cannon
attacks.text: You may discard all Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

data.flavorText: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

data.name: Metagross

ancientTrait.name: θ Double
ancientTrait.text: This Pokémon may have up to 2 Pokémon Tool cards attached to it.

attacks.name: Machine Gun Stomp
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Metang combined to form it. With four brains, it has the intelligence of a supercomputer.

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Plasma Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Plasma card, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You may not use an Ability with the same name during your turn.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Plasma Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Plasma card, reveal it, and put it in your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. You may not use an Ability with the same name during your turn.

attacks.name: Mind Bend
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

data.flavorText: With four linked brains, it's more intelligent than a supercomputer, and it uses calculations to analyze foes.

data.name: Metagross-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Geotech System
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Psychic or Metal Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Giga Hammer
attacks.text: This Pokémon can't use Giga Hammer during your next turn.

attacks.name: Algorithm-GX
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Extend
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, your turn does not end when you play Steven's Resolve.

attacks.name: Meteor Mash
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Meteor Mash attack does 60 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: A linkage of two Metang, this Pokémon can perform any calculation in a flash by utilizing parallel processing in its four brains.

data.name: Metagross ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Magnetic Redraw
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Metagross ex is your Active Pokémon, you may use this power. Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck. Then, each player draws 4 cards. This power can't be used if Metagross ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scanblast
attacks.text: Does 70 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has the same name as the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Metagross ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Metal Reversal
attacks.text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokémon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokémon to switch. If you do, this attack does 40 damage to the new Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Extra Comet Punch
attacks.text: During your next turn, Extra Comet Punch does 50 damage plus 50 more damage.

data.name: Metagross ★
rules: You can't have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.

attacks.name: Critical Collection
attacks.text: Count the number of Prize cards your opponent has taken. Search your discard pile for up to that many Metal Energy cards and attach them to Metagross Star.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Metagross

abilities.name: Levitation Field
abilities.text: Your Pokémon in play have no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Leg Quake
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolution Pokémon, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It analyzes its opponents with more accuracy than a supercomputer, which enables it to calmly back them into a corner.

attacks.name: Bullet Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Synchro Hammer
attacks.text: If this Pokémon and your opponent's Active Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached, this attack does 90 more damage.

attacks.name: Zap Traction
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Max Rush
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Max Rush attack does 150 more damage.

abilities.name: Emergency Entry
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if you drew this Pokémon from your deck at the beginning of your turn and your Bench isn't full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Meteor Mash
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Meteor Mash attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.

data.name: Steven's Metagross ex
rules: Pokémon ex rule: When your Pokémon ex is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: X-Boot
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Basic Psychic Energy card, a Basic Metal Energy card, or 1 of each and attach them to your Psychic Pokémon and Metal Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
